name: df-gid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cgi, cmpt(s0, universe, crio(s1, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ GId =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ iota(s1 ‚àà ran(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),((s1[s0]s2)= s2 ‚àß(s2[s0]s1)= s2))))
comment: Define a function that maps a group operation to the group's identity element. (Contributed by FL, 5-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
